name: postmarking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
postmark
to put a postmark on a letter or parcel: Almost all of the letters were postmarked in Florida. Voter registration forms had to be postmarked by midnight.
More examplesFewer examplesHe talked his way to the front of a line at the post office to have his envelope postmarked before noon.The forms must be delivered or postmarked by 5.00 p.m. Monday.The letter was postmarked September 18.
